project_abstract.cdata: The principal objective of the Economic Management Project is to strengthen the core ministries responsible for managing the country's economy and for implementing the structural adjustment program. Specifically the project will : (i) strengthen the core ministries responsible for managing the economy, particularly in the areas of economic and social development planning, investment programming and debt management, (ii) support implementation of the civil service staff reduction program, (iii) continue assistance for the rationalization of the state enterprise sector; (iv) provide institutional support to the promotion of private sector activity; and (v) carry out macroeconomic, sector and preinvestment studies.
